Title: Desert Heat.
Subtitle: .
Authors: Ja Jance;Judith A. Jance.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=YDFDPgAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Life is good for Joanna Brady in the small desert community of Bisbee. She has Jenny, her adored nine-year-old daughter, and solid, honest, and loving husband, Andy, a local lawman who's running for Sheriff of Cochise County. But her good life explodes when a bullet destroys Andy Brady's future and leaves him dying beneath the blistering Arizona sun. The police brass claim that Andy was dirty -- up to his neck in drugs and smuggling -- and that the shooting was a suicide attempt..
Published Year: 2004.
Average Rating: 4.
